questions.question: How worthwhile was the lab for you on a scale of 1 to 5? 1 Being not worthwhile and 5 being very worthwhile.
Were there any questions that were particularly difficult for you? If so, why?
Is there anything in this lab that you would like to change?
How difficult was the lab for you on a scale of 1 to 5? 1 Being too easy, 5 being too hard, and 3 being just right.
If you responded
to the previous question, what is that other option?
What best describes your previous computer science experience?
options: I have no computer science experience at all
I have taken one or two introductory courses
I self-learned as much as I could
I earned a degree in computer science
I have multiple years of industry experience in this field including my degree
I have multiple years of industry experience in this field without a degree

questions.question: What is your previous statistics experience?
options: I have no statistics experience at all
I have taken one or two introductory courses
I self-learned as much as I could
I earned a degree in statistics
I have multiple years of industry experience in this field including my degree
I have multiple years of industry experience in this field without a degree
